name: Dramafever Black/Night (customizable)
description:
Dramafever Dark theme [bg customizable/NO ADS]
I highly recommend always use an adblock like uBlock Origin and PopUp Block Pro
Now you can: 
* Use default background or change it.
* Change logo or use default (width: 174px height: 35px)
* Choose if the footer is displayed or not.
* Choose if the "try premium for X day" will be displayed or not.

style_settings.label: Hide premium? (try premium for x days)
